mapper.select: SELECT id, dealer_id, dealer_pw, name, phone_number, locale, nick_name, email, company_name, position, match_count FROM dealers WHERE dealer_id = #{dealerId} AND dealer_pw = #{dealerPw}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dealers (dealer_id, dealer_pw, name, phone_number, locale, nick_name, email, company_name, position, match_count) VALUES (#{dealerId}, #{dealerPw}, #{name}, #{phoneNumber}, #{locale}, #{nickName}, #{email}, #{companyName}, #{position}, #{matchCount})
